French.title: Coq au Vin
French.instructions: Marinate chicken in wine for 2 hours. Cook bacon until crispy. Brown chicken pieces. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add wine, stock, and seasonings. Simmer for 1 hour. Make roux with butter and flour. Add to sauce and simmer until thickened. Serve hot.

French.title: Bouillabaisse
French.instructions: Heat oil and cook onions, garlic, and fennel. Add tomatoes, orange peel, and seasonings. Add stock and wine. Simmer for 30 minutes. Add fish and shellfish. Cook until done. Garnish with parsley and serve with rouille.

French.title: Ratatouille Niçoise
French.instructions: Sauté each vegetable separately in olive oil. Combine all vegetables in large pot. Add garlic, herbs, and seasonings. Simmer for 45 minutes until vegetables are tender. Serve hot or cold.

French.title: Beef Bourguignon
ingredients: 3 lbs beef chuck, cut into cubes
French.instructions: Marinate beef in wine for 2 hours. Cook bacon until crispy. Brown beef pieces. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add wine, stock, and seasonings. Simmer for 2 hours. Make roux with butter and flour. Add to sauce and simmer until thickened. Serve hot.

French.title: Quiche Lorraine
French.instructions: Prebake pie crust. Cook bacon until crispy. Sauté onion until soft. Beat eggs with cream, milk, and seasonings. Add bacon, onion, and cheese. Pour into crust. Bake at 375°F for 35-40 minutes until set. Let cool before slicing.

Italian.title: Osso Buco alla Milanese
Italian.instructions: Season veal shanks with salt and pepper. Brown in oil and butter. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add wine, stock, tomatoes, and seasonings. Simmer for 2 hours until tender. Serve with risotto and gremolata.

Italian.title: Risotto ai Porcini
Italian.instructions: Soak mushrooms in hot water. Sauté onion and garlic in oil. Add rice and cook for 2 minutes. Add wine and cook until absorbed. Add stock gradually, stirring constantly. Add mushrooms and cook until rice is creamy. Stir in cheese and butter. Garnish with parsley.

Italian.title: Saltimbocca alla Romana
Italian.instructions: Pound veal cutlets thin. Top each with prosciutto and sage leaf. Secure with toothpicks. Dredge in flour. Cook in oil for 2 minutes per side. Add wine and stock. Simmer for 5 minutes. Remove toothpicks and serve hot.

Italian.title: Penne all'Arrabbiata
Italian.instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Heat oil and cook garlic and chilies. Add wine and cook until reduced. Add tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes. Toss with pasta. Garnish with parsley and serve with Parmesan.

Italian.title: Tiramisu
Italian.instructions: Beat egg yolks with sugar until thick. Add mascarpone and mix well. Whip cream and fold into mixture. Mix coffee with liqueur. Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixture. Layer in dish with cream mixture. Chill for 4 hours. Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

Spanish.title: Paella Valenciana
ingredients: 1 lb chicken thighs, cut into pieces
Spanish.instructions: Heat oil in large paella pan. Brown chicken and rabbit. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add rice and cook for 2 minutes. Add stock, saffron, and seasonings. Simmer for 20 minutes without stirring. Let rest for 5 minutes. Serve with lemon wedges.

Spanish.title: Gazpacho Andaluz
Spanish.instructions: Chop all vegetables. Blend with oil, vinegar, and seasonings. Add water gradually until smooth. Chill for 2 hours. Serve cold with basil garnish.

Spanish.title: Tortilla Española
Spanish.instructions: Cook potatoes and onion in oil until tender. Beat eggs with salt. Add potato mixture to eggs. Cook in large skillet until set. Flip and cook other side. Serve warm or cold.

Spanish.title: Pulpo a la Gallega
Spanish.instructions: Boil octopus for 45 minutes until tender. Boil potatoes until done. Slice octopus and potatoes. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with paprika and salt. Garnish with parsley and serve.

Spanish.title: Churros con Chocolate
Spanish.instructions: Boil water, butter, and salt. Add flour and stir until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time. Pipe into hot oil and fry until golden. Roll in cinnamon sugar. For chocolate, heat cream and add chocolate and sugar. Stir until smooth. Serve churros with chocolate sauce.
